content: hook 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the slip_stitch from the previous round 7 3 single_crochet in 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in last stitch 8 **change to main body color** 4 single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in last stitch increase 9 5 work even 9 6 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 12 7 *single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 15 8 single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet increase in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet in last 6 single_crochet 18 9 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 11 12 increase in first 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet in next 12 single_crochet increase in last 3 single_crochet 24 13 single_crochet in first 9 single_crochet *decrease* 3 times single_crochet in last 9 single_crochet 21 **stuff the nose at this point as it s hard to get to at the end** 14 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet same as joining single_crochet in next 18 single_crochet increase in last 2 single_crochet 24 15 - work even 24 20 21 single_crochet in first 11 single_crochet increase in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet last 11 single_crochet 26 22 single_crochet in first 10 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet in last 28 10 single_crochet 23 work even 28 25 26 *single_crochet in first 5 single_crochet decrease in next* around 24 27 *single_crochet in first single_crochet decrease in next* around 16 28 *decrease over 2 single_crochet* around 8 **stuff rest of body at this point see pictures below if you want to weight the bottom of the animal down so it doesn t fall on it s face every time you set it down ** 29 *decrease every stitch again* around 4 **see if you can cram a little more stuffing in before you close up the hole ** bind off leaving an 8 tail thread the tail through the remaining stitches and pull it tight to close up the hole tuck the tail under several stitches and cut off the tail page 3 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com ears make 2 row instructions stitches 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook 6 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the slip_stitch from the previous round 7 3 - 7 work even 7 bind off leaving a long tail to use later to sew the ears on to the head legs make 4 row instructions stitches 1 chain 2 5 single_crochet in second chain from hook 5 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the slip_stitch from the previous round 6 3 4 work even bind off leaving a tail long enough to sew each leg to the 6 body later on tail row instruction stitches 1 chain 2 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook 4 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the slip_stitch from the previous round 5 3 4 work even bind off leaving
